descr.p: "I Had the Craziest Dream" is a popular song.
The music was written by Harry Warren, the lyrics by Mack Gordon. The song was published in 1942.
The song was introduced by Harry James and his orchestra, with vocals by Helen Forrest, in the film Springtime in the Rockies.

The song was covered in 1953 by the Skylarks, where it was a #28 hit, and again in 1960 on a single by Adam Wade. Astrud Gilberto reached #31 on Billboard's Easy listening survey with her 1967 remake.
